ED_Title: Comprehensive review of the whole question of peacekeeping operations in all their aspects
ED_Plenary_Committee: Special political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee)
ED_OriginatingBody: Special political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee)
ED_DecisionText:
At its 66th plenary meeting, on 7 December 2017, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee). 


(See A/72/449; A/72/PV.66)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
